item.description: RSKSwap is a decentralized exchange to automatically exchange ERC20 tokens, there is no need to wait for a buyer or seller. It has the advantage of the low costs and security of the RSK network. It also doesnâ€™t require KYC and has no limits for withdrawals or deposits. In this webinar you will have a step-by-step guide to create your own token and exchange it in RSKSwap automatically, using smart contracts.
item.tags: rsk, smart contracts, solidity, remix, defi, rskswap, uniswap
item.title: DeFi for Developers: how To Use RSKSwap Smart Contracts To Automate Trading
